desc: Dark League Studios, under RCV Digital Entertainment Group, is the fastest growing esports company today. Registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission in July 2022, DLS aims to unify esports stakeholders by bridging the gap between hardcore fans and casual gamers. Through highly unique Intellectual Properties, grassroots events, industry partnerships, and fan inclusivity, we strive to become the Philippinesâ€™ leading esports organization, promising exciting developments ahead.
Our main goal is to be the top-of-mind grassroots events and esports organizer with the largest gaming community in the country.
